price: Nokorε sε, wͻn a wo Wura Nyankopͻn asεm no nokorε atia wͻn no nnye nni--,
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ حَقَّتۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡ كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna ḥaqqat ʿalayhim kalimatu rabbika lā yu'minūna
